justification: The Methods section states that participants completed the Cardiff Anomalous Perceptions Scale and notes, “For the CAPS (self-reported PP), we used the sumscore of all items marked with ‘yes’,” showing CAPS was used to quantify psychosis proneness.

The article reports that participants filled out “the Autism Quotient (AQ…); the AQ (self-reported AT) is formed by summing over participant’s responses,” indicating the AQ served as the measure of autistic traits.
